entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 12:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: NW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near Bowen Island. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
